page.title: 06Food and Drink
page.content: The majority of people prefer fast, "junk," food but an increasing number are eating health foods and are worried about chemical additives in food. "Junk food," includes frozen meals, hamburger and pizza shops as well as fish and chips. People like sweet sauces like tomato ketchup and sweet drinks like Coke. "Junk food," excludes fresh vegetables and salads. Many children are overweight. Some teenagers experiment with drugs. Heroin addiction is becoming a big problem as is alchohol abuse. Fewer people seem to be smoking cigarettes because of realisation of health risks. Biscuits and sweets are advertised widely on television. Coffee and tea are still favourite drinks. Pet foods are also widely advertised as this industry makes a profit of millions of pounds.
